body:
And... it is assumed that this situation would repeat itself with the other girls as well in case Saito is not stopped from before or at this moment, thus guaranteeing his defeat 

"Sounds good! And I like this ending better"

(First of all, having already discovered these events, I would meet with Azusa to stop her, warning her not to go directly into a possible trap. After, we will come up with a better plan before we go after that asshole. In case we cannot find him in his room or in the place where he ordered her to go, we'll also move to another place since that building would not be a safe place either. Then I will see if she is pregnant or not so that I can take the necessary measures. On the following days we'll continue to look for his current location discreetly around the city. It is predictable that he will enslave more people, so he'll become more confident as he begins to depend on them. So once he's exposed himself enough... *BANG* Nothing was heard from him again, nor was his body found. Finally we help the people that he did harm how to undo his hypnosis so that then they can go back to their normal lives)

So many options she had before she went to attack, and did she just walk away with a knife for someone to appear out of nowhere and catch her so easily?

"Yes, it was disappointing. And more with that Bad ending that the other two girls will have"

Don't worry about that. I found another way to make it interesting

"Really? What?"

It's simple... Every time he thinks he has won, we are going to ruin his plans... and finally we'll kill him!

"Oh, that sounds fun! But I thought you already killed him at first"

So it was. It's just that this time I'm going to do it like I'm starting from this point. I suppose that you will understand why

"I know. So... what are you going to do this time?"
My man just wrote his PhD at the end and it makes fucking sense lmao
Welp, life
If it is what I'm thinking then yes, Azusa appears again on Hypno Blink chapter 15.
I wonder if this girl will show up again before the end. Itd be fun to see her after shes fully broken.
Bety hood...
@Roronoa Zolo Haha ikr. I mean, what were they expecting? There's a rape tag, duh
haha kinda funny how some people here are angry at the protag like they just read it by accident haha so funny 😂
I hope this ugly bastard die's on the slowest and most cruelst death poor Azusa i really hope she get's to her senses and kill this fucking pig  because she is way to strong to fall by that
That was really unexpected
Damn, this going to be a masterpiece.

editor, i think you are on the right track. my theory is that she had a mental breakdown and put herself under "hypnosis". of course it obviously isnt actually hypnosis, she is just convinced that it is and that she cant do anything.
that was awesome
The ugly bastard strikes again.
Maaan this make me nut hard why the fck do i have a gangrape fetish ffs

Pp extremely hard and satisfied
